alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:40PM EDT until July 27 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Westchester County in southeastern New York... Eastern Putnam County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 540 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Peekskill, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Stamford, Danbury, New City, Ossining, New Canaan, Haverstraw, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Greenwich, Ridgefield, Wilton, Weston, Redding, Hawthorne, and Pomona. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
